payload.description: Modify InlineBlockAdder.jsx to add responsive detection and render MobileBlockAdder on mobile (<640px). Add useIsMobile hook from hooks/useSwipeGesture. Conditionally render MobileBlockAdder when isMobile is true, otherwise render existing desktop layout. Pass all props through.
payload.context: Import useIsMobile and MobileBlockAdder. Pattern: const isMobile = useIsMobile(); return isMobile ? <MobileBlockAdder ... /> : <existing desktop code>. Keep all existing desktop functionality unchanged. Breakpoint is 640px (sm:).
